Name: Waterloo Sunset
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: STIR first two ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne. Add raspberry liqueur.
History: Created in 2008 by Dan Warner, then the Beefeater Global Ambassador, hence originally made using said gin.
Nutrition: One serving of Waterloo Sunset contains 130 calories
